page.title: 14SUMMARY
page.content:
We have looked at our survey critically and are aware that people who do not know the area could think that life here could seem to be unexciting and uneventful. Many people who live here, however, would say that though things are relatively peaceful and the pace of life slow in comparison with a more populous area, their lives are full and they would not want to live anywhere else.
This survey has been carried out by the pupils of Settle High School. A group of Sixth Formers did the land-cover and amenities survey, and they and a mixed group of 13 to 16 year olds helped to write all the other contributions during the very wet and windy Summer Term of 1985.
